nodes.bodyText: ooh neat. Is the ability to pass elements around built into React or is this something new you brought in?

it's built in! Another common way react elements are passed around is through props.children which is automatically added to every react component. props.children will be set to whatever is inside of a JSX tag.
Ex.
<Container>
  <div>
    ... w/e JSX content you want
  <div>
</Container>

props.children within the Container component will be equal to the div JSX element.
https://reactjs.org/docs/jsx-in-depth.html#children-in-jsx
I'd seen that and figured it was a special case (which, I guess, it is.)
